content:
I'm a social media manager and I want to analyze the engagement of a specific Twitter account. Can you fetch the usernames of the followers of a Twitter user with the user ID '987654321'?
Begin!

To start with, I will fetch the followers of the Twitter user with the ID '987654321'. This can provide an initial list of followers which can be used to further analyze engagement by looking into their interactions or profiles. Let's begin by fetching the list of user's followers.

I will now check the user's followers list.

It appears that the specific Twitter user with the ID '987654321' has no followers associated with the account based on the current data. Hence, we don't have any further usernames or data to analyze regarding followers' engagement. 

I will notify the user about this situation and conclude this task.
